list_definition.definition: (of literature, art etc) of the highest quality

list_definition.definition: (of dress etc) simple, elegant and traditional

list_definition.definition: an established work of literature of high quality

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I have read all the classics.

list_definition.definition: the language and literature of Greece and Rome
